name: Billion Bastard Bots
description:
Procedurally Generated! Every level created on the fly. Never repeats.

Arena Shooter! Destroy everything to progress to next level.

Varied Combat! 15 enemy types with unique AI, move-sets and attack patterns.

Bullet Hell! Up to 200 enemies attack all at once.

Developed over the course of a year by a solo dev (me!) to distill only the most fun parts of the shooter genre.
